description: Shows annotations (e.g. for overriden methods interface implementations) in your PHP source code.
name: php-integrator-annotations
readme:
# php-integrator/atom-annotations

:coffee: Send me some coffee beans

![Screenshot](http://ipfs.pics/ipfs/QmTMju5ZZtcHBxKzfMfER35QkNik84Yva3HMbTz5LwMVdC) This package provides annotations for your PHP source code using [PHP Integrator](https://github.com/php-integrator/atom-base). **Note that the [php-integrator-base](https://github.com/php-integrator/atom-base) package is required and needs to be set up correctly for this package to function correctly.** What is included? * Annotations for class methods that are implementing a method from an interface. * Annotations for class methods and properties that are overriding base class or trait members. * Tooltips on mouse over that clarify why the annotations are cluttering your gutter with additional icons. * Annotations for overrides and implementations can be clicked to navigate to respectively the method being overridden or implemented. ![GPLv3 Logo](http://gplv3.fsf.org/gplv3-127x51.png)
